We prove a lemma that gives conditions under which a function, for which integration by parts needs not make sense, is equal to a particular constant almost everywhere. 6 6 footnote 6 Haim Brezis, Functional Analysis, Sobolev Spaces and Partial Differential Equations, p. 204, Lemma 8.1.
